Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown pottery vessel, the interior is slightly grooved and covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a brown slip and faint traces of three lines of Greek text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393437) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393437)
